description: This file defines the MenuScreen widget for a Flutter mobile app, displaying a list of menu items with categories, image previews, ratings, and the ability to add items to a cart. It includes UI components such as headers, category chips, and individual menu item cards, along with navigation to detailed item views.

classes.name: MenuScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the menu with category filters and grid of menu items.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Stateless widget rendering the header with 'Discover Menu' title and category choice chips.

classes.name: _MenuCard
classes.description: Stateful widget representing an individual menu item card, showing image, rating, description, price, and add-to-cart button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the menu screen UI, including header and grid of filtered menu items.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Constructs the header section with title and category choice chips.

methods.name: _MenuCard.build
methods.description: Constructs a card UI for a menu item, including image, rating, description, price, and add button, with tap navigation to detail screen.
